QuestData.Title: Archived Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
It seems like this Brother Alen we keep hearing about might have some answers.
At least, I sure hope so. Everyone here seems a bit... evasive.
I think I saw some archivists heading into the southern cloister. If we follow them, I bet we'll find Alen too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Question Brother Alen for information about the missing fleet.
QuestData.RewardText: I'd rather not stick around to see if he's right.

Objectives.Objective: Follow Brother Alen into the Archives
